title: The Invention of the Spoon, Part 1
itunes:title: The Invention of the Spoon, Part 1
description:
It’s time for another invention-based episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind. In this episode, Robert and Joe discuss a very old invention that we can scarcely imagine life without: the spoon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
